name: Forme Sauvage
description:
Forme Sauvage (which means "Wild Form" in French) is a game where you need to capture the wild forms appearing in the top half of the screen, using a matching form among the domesticated ones you own (bottom half). It's a small world, and there are similarities across forms: two forms match when they share an identically-colored shape at the same position.

Forme Sauvage was made exclusively in code: graphics and audio are generated procedurally, using respectively the paper.js library and the web audio api !
